text: Max E. Coffey (born April 28, 1939) was an American politician in the state of Illinois. He served in the Illinois House of Representatives and Illinois State Senate.http://www.lib.niu.edu/1976/ii760821.html#page 29http://articles.chicagotribune.com/1986-01-29/news/8601080097_1_senate-seat- coffey-senate-democrats Coffey was born in Vermilion County, Illinois. He was a farmer and retailer and lived in Charleston, Illinois. He was also a member of the Coles County, Illinois Board, a Charleston Township Supervisor, and delegate to 1982 Republican National Convention. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:People from Charleston, Illinois Category:People from Vermilion County, Illinois Category:Businesspeople from Illinois Category:Farmers from Illinois Category:Illinois Republicans Category:County board members in Illinois Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives Category:Illinois state senators
title: Max E. Coffey
